mods.abstract: Black and white halftone three-quarter length portrait of Joe Edwards and his Gitfiddle Review, seated. A handwritten note on the photo says, "Crop." On the back of the photo, a handwritten note says, "Crop and reduce to 1 inch high 85 line." To view a poster that features the metal photoplate made from this photo, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/31085.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
